Articles.Content:
Hello everybody,

I've wrote some Support Mails a time ago, but got not a single response.

I love this Game, since early access on steam, but with Release the game is unplayable.

With the last Patch i was full of joy if maybe there is a fix for the totally broke Version.

I've readed the Patchnotes and was wondering, that with no single word there is any bugfix for crashes, so....

I cannot revert any Flight, because if my ship will set back, the Game crashes without any message.

It seems, that if the list of stages and activateable pieces is loaded on the side, the crash occures.

Is the Game totally broke if a Ship got more than 12 stages? Every Ship was running in the Early Access.

If anybody want to get more Information about this Error, i will post any requested Infos.

But please, i want to play again, and not uninstall this Game.

Greetings
